scripts.lint: pnpm --dir backend lint && pnpm --dir frontend lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --dir backend lint:fix && pnpm --dir frontend lint:fix
scripts.format: prettier --write "**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md}" && pnpm --dir backend format && pnpm --dir frontend format
scripts.format:check: prettier --check "**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md}" && pnpm --dir backend format:check && pnpm --dir frontend format:check
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --dir backend typecheck && pnpm --dir frontend typecheck
scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --dir backend test && pnpm --dir frontend test
scripts.db:reset: pnpm --filter backend exec prisma migrate reset --force
